targets.queryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.portfolio_risk_quality') AS portfolio_risk_quality, json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.ulcer_index_category') AS ulcer_index_category FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.portfolio_risk_quality') AS portfolio_risk_quality, json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.ulcer_index_category') AS ulcer_index_category FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.currently_in_drawdown') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.currently_in_drawdown') AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_depth_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_duration_days') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.drawdown_status.current_drawdown_duration_days') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.vol_30d_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.vol_30d_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.cvar_95_1m_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.cvar_95_1m_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.max_drawdown_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-365 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;
targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (as_of_date_local || 'T00:00:00Z') AS time, CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.risk.max_drawdown_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current WHERE as_of_date_local >= date('now','-365 day') ORDER BY as_of_date_local;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.risk_quality_score') AS REAL) AS risk_quality_score, json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.risk_quality_category') AS risk_quality_category, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.max_drawdown_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS max_drawdown_1y_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.vol_30d_pct') AS REAL) AS vol_30d_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.cvar_95_1m_pct') AS REAL) AS cvar_95_1m_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY risk_quality_score DESC;
targets.rawQueryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.risk_quality_score') AS REAL) AS risk_quality_score, json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.risk_quality_category') AS risk_quality_category, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.max_drawdown_1y_pct') AS REAL) AS max_drawdown_1y_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.vol_30d_pct') AS REAL) AS vol_30d_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.ultimate.cvar_95_1m_pct') AS REAL) AS cvar_95_1m_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.holdings') j ORDER BY risk_quality_score DESC;
